H0.text: Apimania is an obsession with which creatures. Butterfly

H1.text: Apimania is an obsession with which creatures. Ant

H2.text: Apimania is an obsession with which creatures. Wasp

H3.text: Apimania is an obsession with which creatures. Bee

A4.text: Bees play an important role in pollinating flowering plants, and are the major type of pollinator in many ecosystems that contain flowering plants.

A5.text: Bees are winged insects that form a monophyletic clade Anthophila within the superfamily Apoidea of the order Hymenoptera, with over 20,000 known species in seven recognized families.
